name: beachwear
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
clothes that you wear on a beach: In most tourist destinations, there are plenty of shops selling beachwear and T-shirts. People sit casually on the bar terrace, still in beachwear.
More examplesFewer examplesJuly's glossy magazine covers will feature the usual beachwear.Many people feel the pressure to exercise before daring to put on skimpy beachwear.I love this floral print beachwear, which includes bikinis, one-piece swimsuits, and wraps.It may be hot, but that doesn't mean beachwear is appropriate in the office.Do you absolutely hate shopping for beachwear?
